name: Site Name for Google Search
author: Glenn Tate

sections.description: Use structured data markup on your public website to indicate the preferred name you want Google to display in Search results. You can also provide more than one possible name for your site, and let Google Search algorithms choose between them. Once Google has crawled and indexed the updated page, we can use the provided name in Search results. This plugin adds the proper mark-up to the header of your website.
sections.faq:
Where is the plugin accessed once activated

On the main Settings menu.

short_description: Include Your Site Name in Google Search Results
description: Use structured data markup on your public website to indicate the preferred name you want Google to display in Search results. You can also provide more than one possible name for your site, and let Google Search algorithms choose between them. Once Google has crawled and indexed the updated page, we can use the provided name in Search results. This plugin adds the proper mark-up to the header of your website.

screenshots.caption: Shows where the name will show in the results list.
